[CDF-25332] ðŸ˜€ DatapointsIO (#2186)

# Description

Implements support for uploading Datapoints using protobuf
serialization.

* Adds `DataBodyRequests` to have request messages with bytes directly,
[here](https://github.com/cognitedata/toolkit/pull/2186/files#diff-4fb12b236dfc26468a9963baaf3317c3811072151f79e48bcb013d0992417284R177)
* Extends the dtype conversion with `epoch`,
[here](https://github.com/cognitedata/toolkit/pull/2186/files#diff-12fc440f1c69bc1f42ef62f6349288112c37371db942dc36135b8747efd9102bR490).
This is needed to create epoch timestamps.
* Adding `source_id` to `row_to_resource` interface,
[here](https://github.com/cognitedata/toolkit/pull/2186/files#diff-2ab3a7cd764ca1cf9f9f669767652ac2faa76240c3cef2ea60c9004626cbdabeR243).
This is for improved error messages.

## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] The `cdf data upload` command now supports datapoints.

## templates

No changes.
